project_descr: To provide Technical Support to the process, in solidifying a Sub-regional MPI and in the provision of training and advocacy on a country level to increase the capacity of statistics offices in the implementation on the basic MPI.

outputs.output_descr: To provide Technical Support in solidifying a Sub-regional MPI, make provision for training and advocacy on a country level to increase the capacity of statistics offices in the implementation on the basic MPI.
